root.name: The War in Heaven
root.description: OverviewThe War In Heaven is a Christian first-person action game that takes place during the war between Angels and Demons in Heaven. The player can choose to be on either side of the conflict through twelve levels of Heaven and Hell. Features:3D action combined with spiritual lessons straight from the bible14 distinct types of angels, 7 Fallen, 7 DivineExplore 12 levels of Heaven and HellOutwit and outfight immortal beings with lethal weaponsFully 3D Non-Euclidean world
